item.title: Video shows dramatic rescue of baby pinned under overturned car in Texas
item.description: Authorities in Texas say a baby is expected to make a full recovery.

item.title: FBI indicts dozens in Philadelphia on drug charges
item.description: The charges come as part of a yearslong investigation into a Philadelphia gang.

item.title: Shooting at a party in North Carolina kills 2 and critically injures several others
item.description: A shooting at a large party in southeastern North Carolina has left two people dead and several others critically wounded

item.title: Why trick-or-treaters may bag more gummy candy than chocolate this Halloween
item.description: Trick-or-treaters may find more fruity candy than chocolate among their Halloween handouts this year

item.title: Historic libraries bring modern comfort to book lovers and history buffs in New England
item.description: Centuries-old private libraries are bringing modern comfort and awe to book lovers and history buffs in New England
